name: GDPR Notification
author: Prulancer Team

sections.description: GDPR Notification can allow to display notification bar at footer of wordpress pages with your privacy policy and other information links.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Unzip and Upload gdpr-notification.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Make configuration setting in plugin setting page.
  4. hit “save setting” button.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Add: Text, Background Color, Text Color, Agree button.
  • Add: Color Picker
  • Add: GDPR Notification.

How to contact the support / development team of our GDPR Notification plugin
